EmailTemplate.name: MTO Inquiry Confirmation - We've received your MTO inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Quote, {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Make to Order Inquiry
We’re glad to hear from you!
Thanks for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. We’ve already started working on your {!Case.Subject} inquiry. Because the parts are non-catalog, it may take me a few days to respond with more details.
Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can use this number to track our progress.
Inquiry Status
>> You can track the status of this inquiry online by visiting Inquiry Status.
Questions
We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So please leave the subject line unchanged, should you reply, to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Order Status Team Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
